content.rendered:
Directed by Ahmed Khan

Written by Farhad Samji. Farhad Samji. Sparsh Khetarpal. Tasha Bhambra

Cast Tiger Shroff (Ranveer ‘Ronnie’ Chaturvedi). Riteish Deshmukh (Vikram Charan Chaturvedi). Shraddha Kapoor (Siya Nandan). Ankita Lokhande (Ruchi Nandan). Jameel Khoury (Abu Jalal Gaza). Vijay Varma (Akhtar Lahori). Bhawani Singh Rathore (Police Officer). Jaideep Ahlawat (Inder Paheli Lamba a.k.a ‘IPL’). Shifuji Shaurya Bharadwaj (Shyam Mishra a.k.a ‘Chachaji’). Danish Bhatt (Bilaal). Manav Gohil (Aasif Khan). Pradeep Kabra (Cinema Goon’s Henchman). Slavisha Kajevski (Andre Gomez). Satish Kaushik (Bhokelal Mupe Chatora). Ivan Kostadinov (Zaidi Jalal Gaza). Sunit Morarjee (Inspector Sharad Kute). Disha Patani (Dancer in ‘Do You Love Me?’ Song). Veerendra Saxena (Head-Constable Kailash Tripathi (as Virendra Saxena)). Amit Sharma (Bajwa Singh). Jackie Shroff (Inspector Charan Chaturvedi). Shriswara (Hafeeza Khan (as Shri Swara)). Navdeep Tomar (IPL’s Henchmen). Yash Bhojwani (Little Vikram). Katarina Orlandic (Kidnapped Boy’s Mother). Ayaan Zubair Rahmani (Little Ronnie). Pradeep Rajput (Raghav). Anand Krishnan (Officer).Chandramogli Madem. Mukesh Marko (Rahul). Khayk Morgan (Valha). Nileshpatelxyz (Ips nileshpatelxyz). Hitesh rathod (Ravvi (voice) (as Hitesh Rathod Viratian)). Deependra Singh (Mahi)

Languages Hindi

Producers Bharat Bohra. Alek Conic. Dipti Jindal. Sajid Nadiadwala. Vikram Razdan

Production Fox Star Studio. Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment
